mapper.sql: select goodsid, localflag, stltype, transtype, batchseq, stldate, accid, bankid, seqid, stlcycle, accname, merid, billtype, agentid, agentname, succnumm, succamtm, succnums, succamts, billsuccnumm, billsuccamtm, mutenum, muteamt, shamnum, shamamt, nbsmnum, nbsmamt, xkcostnum, xkcostamt, paybacknum, paybackamt, transamt, cmccstlrates, cmccstlratem, umpstlratem, cmccamount, merrate, merratedes, merstlamt, merstlpay, profit, filemonth, publishtype, agrate, agstlamt, agstlpay, agtpublishtype, agtfilemonth, tax, monum, mtnum, finishsign, state, moduser, modtime, intime, m_goods_id, local_flag from umpay.t_coupon_merset_mid where 1=1 #if( $goodsid && $goodsid!='' ) and goodsid = :goodsid #end #if( $localflag && $localflag!='' ) and localflag = :localflag #end #if( $stltype && $stltype!='' ) and stltype = :stltype #end #if( $transtype && $transtype!='' ) and transtype = :transtype #end #if( $batchseq && $batchseq!='' ) and batchseq = :batchseq #end #if( $stldate && $stldate!='' ) and stldate = :stldate #end #if( $accid && $accid!='' ) and accid = :accid #end #if( $bankid && $bankid!='' ) and bankid = :bankid #end order by seqid desc

SELECT ACCID , STLCYCLE , STLDATE , GOODSID , LOCALFLAG , SEQID , ACCNAME , MERID , BILLTYPE , AGENTID , AGENTNAME , CMCCSTLRATES , UMPSTLRATEM , SUCCNUMM , SUCCAMTM , SUCCNUMS , SUCCAMTS , BILLSUCCNUMM , BILLSUCCAMTM , SUCCALLNUMM , SUCCALLAMTM , MSGAMTM , MUTENUM , MUTEAMT , SHAMNUM , SHAMAMT , MONUM , MTNUM , NBSMNUM , NBSMAMT , PAYBACKNUM , PAYBACKAMT , MERSTLAMT , MERSTLPAY , CMCCAMOUNT , SETTSTATUS , STATE , ISUSE , MODUSER , MODTIME , INTIME , BAD_BILL , UMP_INCOME , BALANCE_AMOUNT , IS_SHOW , IS_VALID FROM UMPAY.T_COUPON_MERSET where 1=1 #if( $ACCID && $ACCID!='' ) and ACCID = :ACCID #end #if( $STLCYCLE && $STLCYCLE!='' ) and STLCYCLE = :STLCYCLE #end #if( $STLDATE && $STLDATE!='' ) and STLDATE = :STLDATE #end #if( $GOODSID && $GOODSID!='' ) and GOODSID = :GOODSID #end #if( $LOCALFLAG && $LOCALFLAG!='' ) and LOCALFLAG = :LOCALFLAG #end
